languages.text: "Возможно, ты помнишь, как я упоминал, что Ахиллеас..." {n}Дознаватель делает паузу прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Ахиллеас Скаландр был передан мне сторонним лицом. Это стороннее лицо вышло на связь со мной. Ей требуется моя безотлагательная помощь".

"You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."
languages.original_text: "Возможно, ты помнишь, как я упоминал, что Ахиллеас..." {n}Дознаватель делает паузу прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Ахиллеас Скаландр был передан мне сторонним лицом. Это стороннее лицо вышло на связь со мной. Ей требуется моя безотлагательная помощь".

traits.locale_text: "You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

"You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

"You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

"You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

languages.text: “或许你还记得，我之前提到过阿吉里亚斯……”{n}海因里希顿了顿，随后继续开了口。{/n}“阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德是由我的同事转到我麾下的。如今，那位同事联系了我，说需要我立刻提供帮助。”
languages.original_text: "You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

traits.locale_text: “或许你还记得，我之前提过一个叫阿吉里亚斯的人……”{n}海因里希顿了顿，随后继续开了口。{/n}“我的同事将阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德转到了我的麾下，而且她联系了我，说需要我立刻提供帮助。”

languages.text: «Tal vez recuerde que mencioné que Achilleas...». {n}Heinrix hace una pausa antes de continuar.{/n} «Que una compañera transfirió a Achilleas Scalander a mi jurisdicción. Dicha compañera ha contactado conmigo. Necesita ayuda urgente».
languages.original_text: "You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez recuerde que mencioné que Achilleas...». {n}Heinrix hace una pausa antes de continuar.{/n} «Que una compañera transfirió a Achilleas Scalander a mi jurisdicción. Dicha compañera ha contactado conmigo. Necesita ayuda urgente».

languages.text: 「我がアキレアスについて言ったことを覚えておられるかもしれませんが…」{n}ハインリックスは一呼吸おいてから続けた。{/n}「あのアキレアス・スカランダーは同僚によって我の担当に移されました。その同僚から連絡があったのです。彼女は我の早急な援助を必要としています」
languages.original_text: "You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

traits.locale_text: 「我がアキレアスについて言ったことを覚えておられるかもしれませんが…」{n}ハインリックスは一呼吸おいてから続けた。{/n}「あのアキレアス・スカランダーは同僚によって我の担当に移されました。その同僚から連絡があったのです。彼女は我の早急な援助を必要としています」

languages.text: « Vous vous rappellerez peut-être que je vous ai dit qu'Achilleas... » {n}Heinrix s'interrompt un instant, puis il poursuit :{/n} « Qu'Achilleas Scalander avait été transféré à ma mission par une collègue. Cette collègue vient justement de me contacter, pour me demander de lui apporter mon aide de toute urgence. »
languages.original_text: "You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous rappellerez peut-être que je vous ai dit qu'Achilleas... » {n}Heinrix s'interrompt un instant, puis il poursuit :{/n} « Qu'Achilleas Scalander avait été transféré à ma mission par une collègue. Cette collègue vient justement de me contacter, pour me demander de lui apporter mon aide de toute urgence. »

languages.text: "Ihr erinnert Euch vielleicht, dass ich einen gewissen Achilleas erwähnt habe ..." {n}Heinrix hält kurz inne und spricht dann weiter.{/n} "Besagter Achilleas Scalander wurde durch eine Kollegin in meinen Zuständigkeitsbereich versetzt. Fragliche Kollegin hat mich nun kontaktiert. Sie benötigt umgehend meine Unterstützung."
languages.original_text: "You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr erinnert Euch vielleicht, dass ich einen gewissen Achilleas erwähnt habe ..." {n}Heinrix hält kurz inne und spricht dann weiter.{/n} "Besagter Achilleas Scalander wurde durch eine Kollegin in meinen Zuständigkeitsbereich versetzt. Fragliche Kollegin hat mich nun kontaktiert. Sie benötigt umgehend meine Unterstützung."

languages.text: "Hatırlarsın, Achilleas'tan bahsetmiştim." {n}Heinrix, biraz duraksayıp devam ediyor.{/n} "Achilleas Scalander, bir tanıdığımca benim altıma verilmişti. İşte o tanıdığım benimle irtibata geçti. Acil olarak yardımımı istiyor."
languages.original_text: "You may recall that I mentioned that Achilleas..." {n}Heinrix pauses before continuing,{/n} "That Achilleas Scalander was transferred into my remit by a colleague. The colleague in question has contacted me. She requires my immediate assistance."

traits.locale_text: "Achilleas'tan söz ettiğimi hatırlıyor olabilirsin." {n}Heinrix devam etmeden önce duraksıyor.{/n} "O Achilleas Scalander, benim yetkime bir tanıdığım vasıtasıyla transfer edildi. İşte o tanıdığım benimle irtibata geçti. Acilen yardımımı istiyor."
